Class ProjectsList

java.lang.Object
ProjectsList
public class ProjectsList extends Object
This class handles the collections that are used to hold Project and Party Objects.

  • Method Details

    • getprojectsList

      protected static ProjectsList getprojectsList()
      A method to instanciate a singleton instance of this class.
      Returns:
      Returns an instance of ProjectsList

    • addProject

      protected void addProject​(Project project)
      A method that adds a Project Object to 'this' projects set.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to be added to the projects list

    • getProjects

      protected ArrayList<Project> getProjects()
      A method that returns the Project items in the projects set as an ArrayList<Project>.
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList<Project> of projects.

    • getOverdueProjects

      protected ArrayList<Project> getOverdueProjects()
      A method that returns the overdue Project items in the projects set as an ArrayList<Project>. A Project is considered overdue if its Project.deadline attibute is greater than 'today'.
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList<Project> of overdue projects.

    • addCompletedProject

      protected void addCompletedProject​(Project project)
      A method that adds a Project Objet to the completedProjects set and removes it from the projects set.
      Parameters:
      project - the completed project.

    • searchProjectByName

      protected Project searchProjectByName​(String projectName)
      A meathod that searches for a Project Object by the project name.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project being searched for.
      Returns:
      returns the Project Object with a that project name that matches the search string. Returns null if no matches are found.

    • searchProjectByNumber

      protected Project searchProjectByNumber​(String projectNumber)
      A meathod that searches for a Project Object by the project number.
      Parameters:
      projectNumber - The number of the project being searched for.
      Returns:
      returns the Project Object with a that project number that matches the search string. Returns null if no matches are found.

    • addPary

      protected void addPary​(Party party)
      A method that adds a Party object to one of the party sets, depending on the Party.partyType.
      Parameters:
      party - The party to be added.

    • searchpParty

      protected Party searchpParty​(String name, String partyType)
      A method to search for a Party object in any of the parties sets.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the party to be seached.
      partyType - the type of the party being searched. (Contractor, Architect, or Customer).
      Returns:
      returns the Party Object that matches the searched name or returns null if the party is not found.
